newsitem.title: USA: Air-Cure changes name to ITEQ Inc.
newsitem.headline: Air-Cure changes name to ITEQ Inc.

text.p: Shareholders of Air-Cure Technologies Inc approved a change in the company's name to ITEQ Inc at a special shareholder meeting, the company said Thursday.
The company said that ITEQ is an acronym for "international," "technology" and "equipment,"which are its core businesses.
Effective March 10, the symbol for the company's common stock will change from ATSS to ITEQ.
ITEQ is a supplier of manufactured equipment and engineered systems used in the processing, treatment and movement of gases and liquids.
